sentence.Network_en: How often we have been temerarious and rushed unwisely in.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们不知有过几次不顾一切而又不理智地冲进里面.

sentence.Network_en: Some people are just temerarious enough to break the rules for their own sake.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些人就是可以不顾一切的为了自己的利益破坏规矩.

list.abs: He temerariously criticized the board chairman ., 他鲁莽地批评了董事长.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin temerarius (from temere 'rashly') + -ous
